questions.question: What ___ for breakfast this morning?
I keep my T-shirts and jumpers in the ___ in my room.
Do you want to read? Put the ___ on so you can see.
I write a ___ about my adventures and post something online every week.
My uncle ___ computer games all the time. He doesn’t like watching TV.
Have you got ___ to drink?
I met ___ at the park yesterday who plays the drums in a band.
When you go for a job interview, it’s a good idea to wear ___.
My cousin rides a motorcycle and wears a really awesome black ___ jacket.
This isn’t my parents’ car. ___ car is red.
I really like your scarf. Is it ___ Juana?
This meal was delicious. Let me pay the ___.
I can give you your money back if you still have the ___.
Can you give me ___ paper please? I want to give you my phone number.
I bought ___ new purse yesterday.
Have you got ___ cash you can lend me?
Joe Lee is well-known ___ his blog about food.
In China a lot of meat dishes come with ___ and vegetables.
You need eggs to make ___ and you can add cheese or mushrooms.
Why don’t you have ___ with your burger? It’s healthier than chips.
My cousin is ___ my brother. He’s two and my brother is ten.
Do you think chicken legs are ___ chicken curry?
The red T-shirt is ___ the orange one.
This computer has a large ___, so it can hold a lot of information.
I sometimes ___ the internet to find cheap clothes and shoes.
I think Edinburgh is one of ___ cities in the world!
This supermarket is ___ shop in my town.
You feel very hot. You’ve got a ___. You should go to the doctor.
I don’t know what’s wrong but my toe really ___.
What do you think I ___ wear to the party tonight?
